about_the_game:
SSEN

At a time when magical powers ruled the world, dark forces approached the kingdom of SSEN.
The endless forces of darkness have reduced the entire kingdom to ruins.
His beloved princess was also in danger.
Please save her from dark forces. And bring back a peaceful and beautiful kingdom again.

SIMPLE CONTROLS

Easy and simple controls and intuitive game design make it easy to use various attacks.
Experience spectacular action with simple controls.

COLLECT VARIOUS ARTIFACTS

As you face higher-level enemies, you can acquire more new artifacts.
Obtain all the artifacts in the game with your awesome abilities.

UPGRADES OF VARIOUS WEAPONS

Many upgrades are possible, and each upgrade shows more spectacular changes in effect.
Experience new and spectacular weapons through all upgrades.

At a time when magical powers ruled the world, dark forces approached the kingdom of SSEN.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15+
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630+ (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card

name: SSEN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM / DirectX 10+ support
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM / DirectX 10+ support
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card

short_description: Enjoy spectacular action with easy Controls. Upgrade awesome weapons. Collect various artifacts.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
